mapper.insert: insert into calendar (bandId, userId, title, start, end, description, backgroundColor, allDay, borderColor, textColor) values (#{bandId},#{userId},#{title},#{start},#{end},#{description},#{backgroundColor},#{allDay},#{borderColor},#{textColor})
mapper.update: update band set bandName = #{bandName}, bandInfo = #{bandInfo}, bandFile=#{uuidFilename} where bandId = #{bandId}
mapper.delete: delete from follow where fromId=#{fromId} and toId=#{toId} and bandId=#{bandId}
